subtitle: These Scotch pancakes with sultanas are good for tea-time.

method.text: Mix together the flour and sugar in a large bowl. Make a well in the centre and stir in the egg and beat in sufficient milk to make the consistency of thick cream. Add sultanas to the mixture.
Drop 4 small spoonfuls of the mixture, spaced well apart, onto a lightly greased hot griddle or heavy-based frying pan.

Cook the pancakes for 2-3 min at a steady heat, until bubbles rise to the surface of the pancake and burst. Then turn the pancakes with a palette knife and cook for a further 2-3 min until golden. Keep the pancakes warm while cooking the remainder.
Serve the pancakes while still warm with butter.

title: Fruity pancakes
